query.statement: INSERT INTO FSR_NEW_RECIPE_CUISINE( NEW_RECIPE_SEQ , CUISINE_SEQ , CUISINE_DESC , PHOTO_PATH , ATTR01 , ATTR02 , ATTR03 , ATTR04 , ATTR05 , ATTR06 , ATTR07 , ATTR08 , ATTR09 , ATTR10 , CUSER , CDATE , UUSER , UDATE , SPHOTO_PATH ) VALUES ( #NEW_RECIPE_SEQ# , #CUISINE_SEQ# , #CUISINE_DESC# , #PHOTO_PATH# , #ATTR01# , #ATTR02# , #ATTR03# , #ATTR04# , #ATTR05# , #ATTR06# , #ATTR07# , #ATTR08# , #ATTR09# , #ATTR10# , #g_EmpNo# , SYSDATE , #g_EmpNo# , SYSDATE , #SPHOTO_PATH# )
